select A.*,B.name userName from ( select '待处理' taskStatus,t1.contract_code taskCode,'cght' taskType,CONCAT_WS('-',t1.contract_name,step_name) taskTitle,t.step,t.step_name stepName, case when t.check_role =null then t1.create_user else (select GROUP_CONCAT(user_id) from t_pss_user_role tt where tt.role_code = t.check_role) end userId, t.process_id processId,t.opt_time optTime from t_pss_process_task t inner join t_pss_contract_purchase t1 on t.process_id = t1.process_id where t.step != '-1' and t.process_type = 'cght'
union all
select '待处理' taskStatus,t1.contract_code taskCode,'xsht' taskType,CONCAT_WS('-',t1.contract_name,step_name) taskTitle,t.step,t.step_name stepName, case when t.check_role =null then t1.create_user else (select GROUP_CONCAT(user_id) from t_pss_user_role tt where tt.role_code = t.check_role) end userId, t.process_id processId,t.opt_time optTime from t_pss_process_task t inner join t_pss_contract_sale t1 on t.process_id = t1.process_id where t.step != '-1' and t.process_type = 'xsht'
union all
select '待处理' taskStatus,t1.order_code taskCode,case t1.order_type when '1' then 'cgdd' when '2' then 'ckd' end taskType,CONCAT_WS('-','采购订单',t2.supplier_name,t.step_name) taskTitle,t.step,t.step_name, case when t.check_role is null or t.check_role ='' then t1.applicant else (select GROUP_CONCAT(user_id) from t_pss_user_role tt where tt.role_code = t.check_role) end userId, t.process_id processId,t.opt_time optTime from t_pss_process_task t inner join t_pss_order t1 on t.process_id = t1.process_id left join t_pss_supplier t2 on t1.supplier_code = t2.supplier_code where t.step != '-1' and t.process_type = 'cgdd' ) A left join t_pss_user B on A.userId = B.user_id where 1=1
and A.userId like "%"#{userId}"%"
